# Native Interop Docs

## Native interoperability

- [Expose .NET components to COM](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/native-interop/expose-components-to-com.md): This tutorial shows you how to expose a class to COM from .NET Core. You generate a COM server and a side-by-side server manifest for Registry-Free COM.
